cast.name: 森内姆·特米兹 Senem Temiz

introduction: A story about Ray, a homeless man and Liam, a young man who is frustrated with his life and seeking another way of making a living. One night as Liam tries to escape the police during a failed drug deal, he crashes into Ray who is walking the street pushing his trolley. Ray is looking for his daughter, Gemma, as he has not seen her for 15 years. However, unbeknownst to Ray, the young man, Liam, who he crashed into is her boyfriend! Ultimately the paths of Ray and Liam and others, are set to collide in a tale that details loss, regret and the harsh realities of society until this incident defines their identities in their life outside on the street.
